What did Pokemon do?

Pokemon took the combat formula from traditional turn-based RPGs and turned it inside-out.

In traditional RPGs you have a few characters who learn more and more attacks and spells.

What did Pokemon do?

Pokemon took the combat formula from traditional turn-based RPGs and turned it inside-out.

In traditional RPGs you have a few characters who learn more and more attacks and spells.
